(This will be a step to bringing in the Otyebis, which will be involved in a 
storyline OK'd by Yanshosh)

Imprisoner/Predator/Choran:



Imprisoner looked up with new hope as the relatively large bounty hunter 
craft big enough to hold a few dozen people descended and landed on top of a 
few hundred foot trees easily crushing them in the process of its landing.

"Come on, we're finally getting off this rock!" Imprisoner yelled, running 
towards the craft, followed by his two companions.  Upon reaching the vessel 
they watched as the large hatch opened and they piled in.

"What the slag!" Predator yelled of surprise.


Instead of the familiar faces of fellow bounty hunters stood a diverse group 
of armed creatures.

There were robots, some Cybertronian, others the bounty hunters had never 
seen that were varying in size and shape.  Humanoid creatures whose color of 
skin ranged from red to white.  Some had feathers, some had scales.

The only similar thing about them other than general shape was their 
uniforms.  Neat orderl uniforms of red and gold color.  The robots didn't 
have uniforms, just various symbols with those colors.  Some of the smaller 
humanoid had combat suits.

"Wha..."

"Ah, some of the original occupants of this craft.  How interesting, and 
according to their records they were the top three of this bounty hunting 
guild."

"Maybe," another being said stepping forward, "but come on, Sequencer, look 
at them!  They're just a bunch of untrained Predacons."

"Still, Sinew..."

"Still nothing!" Sinew interrupted.

"Who are you...things?" Imprisoner asked, not sure which words to use.

"We need slots filled in for the Championship!  Cannon fodder matches!  We 
used the others, this is an opportune time to gather more battling specimens. 
 I think Kaiser will be quite unhappy if we don't---"

"Hey!  We asked you a question!" Choran yelled, his rapid-firing laser rifle 
drawn and pointed at Sequencer's head.  Sequencer was a robot, though not of 
Cybertronian designs.  He stood at ten feet tall and was mostly just 
different shades of red and gold.  His head was bucket shaped with a few 
antennaes sticking out of the top.  He had broad shoulders though and a thick 
chest, but where his midsection would be was just energy that seemed to hold 
the body and legs together.  The legs looked somewhat like they were made of 
tin cans.

Predator raised his missile launcher, aiming at the general crowd while 
Imprisoner raised a laser pistol and aimed it at Sinew, who appeared to be 
human, orsomething close to it.  He had golden tanned skin with long curly 
blond hair and brown eyes.  He was very muscular looking in his tight, padded 
uniform.  He looked with anger towards Predator and then to Imprisoner.  

"Well, Sequencer, I think we should just kill them now," he said, the couple 
dozen assorted beings behind him aiming all kinds of different weapons at the 
Predacons.  "Perhaps you should explain what is happening to these dolts."

"Most certainly, Sinew.  We are from the IGL, you shall learn what that 
stands for soon enough.  The President of the IGL, President Kaiser, requests 
more combatants for the championship to fill in time slots.  We are thinking 
of selecting you for that great honor, though out of utter need and not 
because your fighting skills are of interest.  You can resist if you wish, 
but it will only cause time to be wasted."

"What's the IGL?"

"Oh, I've had enough with this." Sinew said, drawing a boxy pistol from a 
holster attached to his uniform and fired off four blue bolts off.  The ice 
bolts froze Imprisoner's joints at the shoulders and legs so he couldn't 
move.  It would wear off soon, but not soon enough.

"As you can see, you aren't going anywhere." Sequencer said, a sudden jolt 
shaking the craft lightly as it blasted off through the air and began heading 
out of Earth's atmosphere.  "We will be arriving with the Otyebis very soon, 
I suggest you make this a more pleasant trip by cooperating with us."

Predator and Choran looked to each other and set their weapons on the ground.

"Most appreciated." Sinew chuckled.
